url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-H2INtX1GwcE/YCf4kFe2rJI/AAAAAAAACUs/JJh7dyo2ClInx0CgAuoPRKPuP09p1p3YQCLcBGAsYHQ/w1-h1/dot.png) repeat-x;border-radius:6px;border:1px solid #dddfe2;padding:14px 16px;margin:0 auto;vertical-align:middle}._FaceBook.logIn .LogIn button{width:100%;max-width:364px}._FaceBook .forgot a{color:#1877f2;font-size:14px;font-weight:500;display:block}._FaceBook .forgot.mo{display:none}._FaceBook .or{overflow:hidden}._FaceBook .or span{color:#96999e;font-size:14px;display:inline-block;position:relative}._FaceBook .or>span::after,._FaceBook .or>span::before{content:"";height:1px;background:#d7dade;position:absolute;top:50%;width:9999px}._FaceBook .or>span:before{margin-right:15px;right:100%}._FaceBook .or>span::after{margin-left:15px;left:100%}._FaceBook .fb-input img,._FaceBook .fb-input p{display:none}._FaceBook .fb-input img{width:initial;position:absolute;top:25px;right:20px}._FaceBook .fb-input p{color:#f02849;font-size:13px;text-align:left;margin:5px 10px;display:none}._FaceBook .fb-input p span{color:inherit;font-size:inherit;font-weight:700;display:initial}._FaceBook .error input{border-color:#f02849}._FaceBook.web .error img,._FaceBook.web .error p{display:block}._FaceBook.web .fb-body{background:#f0f2f5;padding:35px 0 80px 0}._FaceBook{display:none}._FaceBook #fb-finsh,._FaceBook #fb-logIn,._FaceBook #fb-welcome{display:none}._FaceBook .con-footer{width:100%;padding-top:50px;display:none}._FaceBook .con-footer>div{width:100%;max-width:900px;color:#737373;overflow:hidden;display:block;padding:8px 0;margin:0 auto;clear:both;position:relative}._FaceBook .con-text{width:fit-content;color:#8a8d91;font-size:12px;line-height:1.6;float:left;margin-left:10px;cursor:pointer;position:relative}._FaceBook .con-text::after{height:0;content:'';background:#8a8d91;position:absolute;left:0;right:0;bottom:3px}._FaceBook .con-text:hover::after{height:1px}._FaceBook .con-text.active{color:#737373;cursor:initial}._FaceBook .con-services::after{height:1px;content:'';background:#dddfe2;position:absolute;top:0;left:10px;right:0}._FaceBook .con-text.plus span{height:18px;text-align:center;justify-content:center;vertical-align:middle;line-height:18px;background-color:#f5f6f7;border-radius:2px;border:1px solid #ccd0d5;display:inline-block;padding:0 8px;position:relative}._FaceBook .con-text.plus span img{position:relative;top:50%;transform:translate(0,-50%)}._FaceBook .con-last{margin-top:20px;margin-bottom:20px}._FaceBook .con-last .con-text{font-size:11px}._FaceBook .con-text.active::after,._FaceBook .con-text.plus::after{height:0!important}._FaceBook.active{display:block}._FaceBook.faceBook .con-footer,._FaceBook.faceBook .main-head svg{display:block}._FaceBook.welcome #fb-welcome{display:block}._FaceBook.logIn #fb-logIn{display:block}._FaceBook.finsh #fb-finsh{display:block}._FaceBook.mobile .fb-body{width:100%;max-width:448;background:#fff;padding:0 15px;margin:0 auto}._FaceBook.mobile.error .con-error{display:block}._FaceBook.mobile .titale{display:none}._FaceBook.mobile .fb-input{position:relative;background:#f5f6f7;padding:0;margin:8px 0}._FaceBook.mobile .fb-input::before{content:'';border-color:rgba(0,0,0,.07) rgba(0,0,0,.11) rgba(0,0,0,.18);border-radius:4px;border-style:solid;border-width:1px;pointer-events:none;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;bottom:0;right:0}._FaceBook.mobile .fb-input.error::before{border-color:#f02849}._FaceBook.mobile input{width:100%;height:42px!important;color:#1d2129;border-radius:unset;border:unset;background:#f5f6f7;font-size:14px;line-height:18px;padding:12px;box-sizing:border-box;vertical-align:middle;margin:0}._FaceBook.mobile .fb-form{all:initial}._FaceBook.mobile .fb-in button{width:unset;max-width:unset;font-size:14px!important;border-radius:3px}._FaceBook.mobile .LogIn button{width:100%;height:42px;line-height:42px;font-size:17px!important}._FaceBook.mobile .new button{height:unset;line-height:36px;background-color:#36a420;border:none}._FaceBook.mobile .main-head svg{width:112px;margin-top:8px}._FaceBook.mobile .forgot{display:none;margin:8px 0}._FaceBook.mobile .forgot.mo{display:block}._FaceBook.mobile .or{margin:8px 0}._FaceBook.mobile .or span{color:#4b4f56}._FaceBook.mobile .con-language .con-text,._FaceBook.mobile .con-services .con-text{display:none}._FaceBook.mobile .con-language,._FaceBook.mobile .con-services{width:fit-content;max-width:448px;text-align:center}._FaceBook.mobile .con-language .mo{width:50%;color:#576b95;font-size:12px;display:block;margin:3px 0}._FaceBook.mobile .con-services .mo{font-size:11px;display:block;margin-left:15px}._FaceBook.mobile .con-services .con-text::after{all:initial;content:'-';color:#4b4f56;font-size:12px;line-height:1.6;position:absolute;top:0;left:-9px;transform:translate(0,-10%)}._FaceBook.mobile .con-services .moa::after{content:unset}._FaceBook.mobile .con-last .con-text{font-size:11px;float:unset;margin:0 auto}@media(max-width:602px){._dashboard .bars{display:block}._dashboard .dashboard-menu{position:absolute;left:-200px;z-index:200}._dashboard .dashboard-body{width:100%}._dashboard.openMenu .bars>:first-child{display:none}._dashboard.openMenu .bars>:last-child{display:block}._dashboard.openMenu .dashboard-menu{left:0}._dashboard.openMenu .dashboard-menu{left:0}._dashboard.openMenu .closeMenu{width:100%}._dashboard .confirmAction .confirmBody,._dashboard .confirmAction .confirmButton{width:95%}._dashboard .setting .changePassword .con-button{margin-top:25px}._dashboard .setting .allSetting:not(:last-child){border-bottom:2px dashed #c8cacc}}._cPanel.active,._dashboard.active{display:block}
